title: Case Studies in Sustainability : ExpertTalks
description: Present real-world success stories from organizations adopting sustainable technologies and the measurable impact of those efforts.

title: Hackathon for Sustainability:
description: Team-based competition to develop innovative solutions to real-world sustainability challenges within a limited timeframe. A special prize pool for the competition.

title: Start-upshowcases : E-Summit
description: Aims to create a dynamic platform for knowledge exchange, collaboration, and showcasing talent, empowering participants to turn ideas into impactful ventures through Panel Discussion, Podcasts, Hackpreneurship A special prize pool for the competition.
